title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, Phi-3, etc. locally via a single CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library and asyncio client for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLM, embeddings or tool-calling backends.

title: ollama-webui (formerly ollama-ui)
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI (like ChatGPT) that connects to any local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced interactive REPL with history, syntax highlighting and prompt templates.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and docker-compose stacks (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline code suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and reactive support.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Async Rust crate for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK and generative AI extensions for Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama as generator or embedder in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cody
summary: Sourcegraph Cody extension that points to local Ollama models for code chat.

title: ollama-embeddings
summary: Official example repo showing how to generate embeddings with Ollama (nomic-embed-text, mxbai-embed, etc.).

title: ollama-rag
summary: Turn-key RAG template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain in a single docker-compose.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app to bring Ollama completions into enterprise Slack workspaces.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated list of custom Modelfiles and quantized GGUFs for Ollama.
